---
title: "Exclusions Report"
output: pdf_document 
---

``` {r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

xlog <- snakemake@input[[1]] %>%
    read.csv(sep = "\t") %>%
    as_tibble()

init <- xlog[1, ]
after <- xlog[-1, ]

init_length <- init$resulting_length

```

# Exclusions Summary

Starting length before exclusions: `r init_length`bp

``` {r echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
after %>%
    mutate(exclusion = basename(exclusion),
           percent_decrease = 100 * resulting_length / init_length,
           bp_diff = lag(resulting_length) - resulting_length) %>%
    knitr::kable()
```
